name: Brielle
description:
Brielle is an experimental puzzle game tackling the everyday effects of anxiety. Identify and face your anxieties that block your way.

System Requirements
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 296 MB available space
  • Sound card: Intergrated audio interface
Controls
  • Move: W, A, S, D/arrow keys or left stick
  • Jog: Shift key or left bumper
  • Manipulate camera: Mouse movement or right stick
  • Interact: Left mouse button or A button
  • Skip: Spacebar key (while in dialogue)
  • Pause menu: Escape key or start button
